author: bwana
title: Cardano Linux Distro for SBCs
description: Third parties are vulnerabilities. Running a node is the answer but compromises resources on your computer. SBC nodes are the answer.
solution: An open source Linux distro with tools to host and interact with a local Cardano node running on a SBC through local dapps or web interface.
experience: Developed similar Linux distro for EVM networks supporting Geth, Parity and Mantis clients with dedicated hardware nodes in 2019.
